(amụrụ na June 26, 1970), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Irv Gotti, bụ ónyé American DJ, ónyé na-emepụta egwu, onye isi ndekọ, na ónyé isi na onye guzobere Murder Inc. Ihe ndekọ
A maara ya nke ọma màkà ịmepụta ọtụtụ ndekọ ọnụ ọgụgụ mbụ màkà Ashanti, Ja Rule, na Jennifer Lopez, yana mmekorita ya na Jay-Z, DMX, na Kanye West
Gotti bụkwa onye mepụtara usoro BET Tales
A mụrụ Irv Gotti na mpaghara Hollis nkè Queens na New York City.
Mgbè o nyesịrị Def Jam aka na ihe ịga nke ọma nke DMX na Jay-Z, Russell Simmons nyèrè Irv Gotti akara nke ya n'okpuru Def Jam
Ka ọ na-ekiri Biography na A&E n'oge izu ndị omempụ, akara Murder, Inc
pụtara na ihuenyo ma Irv Gotti kpebiri iji aha ahụ màkà akara ya n'ihi na Murder, inc
wepụtara ihe màkà igbu ọchụ na Irv chọrọ iwepụta ndekọ.
